REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0030 reute u f BC-CHINA-UNIT-TO-ISSUE-B 04-17 0056

TEXT.TITLE: CHINA UNIT TO ISSUE BONDS IN HONG KONG
TEXT.BODY: Guangdong International Trust and Investment Corp is preparing to issue 300 mln HK dlrs in bonds in Hong Kong, the China Daily Business Weekly said. It said the issue will be the first such bond issue in Hong Kong by a local organisation but gave no more details. REUTER
